HOME.TITLE: Home
HOME.WELCOME: Break Pirates - Live Pirate Style Radio
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Established back in 2001, Break Pirates broadcast the very best in breakbeat music live over the Internet 24/7. From the latest Hardcore, Breaks and Drum & Bass tunes to the Oldskool Hardcore, Techno, House and Jungle classics, you'll find them all here. The station unites DJs worldwide, giving a wider view of the music scene.
HOME.WE_PRIDE_OURSELVES: We pride ourselves in bringing you an authentic mix of tunes from the classic era of Rave, along with the very latest upfront tunes from current day producers and labels. All of this delivered in a style familiar to those of you who locked into the pirate stations across the UK back in the day.
HOME.FIND_OUT_MORE: Find out more about our DJs in the profiles area

SOCIAL.TITLE: Social
SOCIAL.CHAT_ISSUES: Issues with the chat room disconnecting or not scrolling? Consider installing an IRC chat app for your computer or phone using the instructions below.

SOCIAL.CHAT_SERVER_DETAILS: Join #{{ ircChannel }} on Hostco IRC network (server: {{ ircServer }}, port: {{ ircPort }}). You'll need a copy of mIRC (www.mirc.co.uk), LimeChat, IceChat or a similar IRC client.
